website_summaries.verdict: A great value for the price, but not the best if you're going to be in the water.
pros: Can be used alone or under makeup
cons: Runs easily when it gets wet

customer_reviews.title: I am particularly happy to see that my facial 'brown spots' have not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptionally effective, yet lightweight and easy-to-apply sunscreen. I have used it during many hot and humid travel days and, even after some time in the direct sun, I did not tan or burn. I am particularly happy to see that my facial 'brown spots' have not increased (and in fact, seem to have improved) in the few months that I have been using this sunscreen. It's good!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: The BEST sunscreen for face and neck
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen was recommended to me by a dermatologist over fifteen years ago. It's the only sunscreen I use on my face - period. It works well under my foundation. Sometimes I'll even mix a little extra in with my foundation for additional coverage. I find it works best over moisturizer. I have not had any breakouts from this product. The only thing is if you're spending a entire day in the sun you should re-apply it if you sweat. I'm so glad it's available on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: goldilvr

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Originally suggested by my dermatologist, I’m very glad I listened. It is noncomedogenic (won’t clog pores) virtually fragrance free and Spf 50. I have troubled skin from sun damage and severe acne in my younger years. I use it after moisturizing in the morns and then apply make up if I’m going too. I do not leave the house without it and radiograph shows no new sin damage after a year of working outside 3 to 4 days per week. Only a small amount is needed so price is actually better than most high end products. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Socalgal

customer_reviews.title: Received dried, half full, incorrect product
customer_reviews.text: I love the Elta products. I give them 5 stars but I did not receive what I ordered. I did not receive Elta 45 but instead received Elta 41 tinted. The tube is half full of dried product. Very unhappy, especially since the cost has risen so much. Unfortunately I did not check either of the two I received in time to return. I anticipated that I would receive the correct product, but was mistaken. My bad. Check your Elta when you receive it to be certain this doesn't happen to you!
customer_reviews.author: DLWH

customer_reviews.title: Most favorite sunscreen EVER
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite EltaMd sunscreen! I have used their UV physical (tinted) and their moisturizing spf 30, and this one is definitely my favorite. It is clear, which I prefer because I don’t stain clothes and towels with brown sunscreen, and it also does not bother my eyes like the moisturizing one. I can smear this all over my face and eyes three times per day and before runs and it doesn’t sting my eyes or make me break out. I wear it every single day on my face and it has worked really well for me. Not greasy, but also not drying on my skin. This is my absolute favorite sunscreen that I’ve tried from them.
customer_reviews.author: e_whospends_money

customer_reviews.title: Good product, received damaged
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sunscreen. It is the only sunscreen that dries matte and doesn’t leave me feeling like a greaseball. However, be prepared to receive your product smashed since its bit packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: 440kcal

customer_reviews.title: Best clear zinc-based sun screen to be found.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best Zinc oxide based sunscreen I have found. I hesitated buying because I previously had the tinted version, and some reviewers here stated the clear version left a visible white sheen. I am not seeing any visible residue from this clear version at all. It feels very light and goes smoothly onto my combination skin and I have had no breakouts. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I read a review (here) from someone with dry skin, which stated this sunscreen is for people with oily skin. Well, let me correct that. It's not good for oily skin either. Those of us who already have a shiny appearance due to the excessive and ongoing oil on our face will end up with even more shine with this sunscreen. So, perhaps only people with normal (perfect) skin should use this product because it will make your face shiny, which for some odd reason, many people like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HALF AMOUNT OF PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe that this happened. I bought this couple months ago, and finally I opened the box to take a look how much it’s inside. So I put it next to my table lamp, and it’s only half of the package. I don’t know why this happened, but it’s ridiculous that I paid the regular price and get only half of the product. You guys can see that the seal it’s still on it. THAT’S CHEATING ON CUSTOMERS.
customer_reviews.author: Di D.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen. There is no discernible smell, it doesn't make me break out and goes on smoothly without being too thick. It's somewhat pricey but it does the trick - it protects my skin and helps prevent sun damage. You do need to reapply after going in the pool and sweating for a period of time but I suppose you need to do that with just about any sunscreen. My dermatologist recommends it and so do I. Until something better comes out, I will continue using Elta MD.
customer_reviews.author: soyday

customer_reviews.title: I'll use it
customer_reviews.text: I guess I will forever be on the hunt for sunscreen that doesn't make me oily. I'm thinking it doesn't exist. I have oily skin and was hoping this wouldn't make it more oily. It's not as bad as others I've used but it still makes my face oily pretty much immediately after putting it on. I will use it because I like this brand and it works well, but I will buy something else next time. If you have oily skin, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sun screen for years
customer_reviews.text: I love you EltaMD sunblock! I've used this product for YEARS after my dermatologist office sold them when I was in college. Man. It's great. We have to apply sunblock everyday. This one just does exactly that. I don't need anything but sunblock. Doesn't clog my pores, doesn't really smell, goes well under make up. None of the hoopla. Reapply every 2-3 hours. It's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: SMyle

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTH Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is a dermatologist and gave us a sample ELTA sun screen. We use it on our face and neck more as a conservation of product as we use up other sunscreens we have for other sun exposed parts. It goes on so smooth, no stick, wet, greasy feeling. No sting when I apply it after I shave.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES LOSCH

customer_reviews.title: Causes rash
customer_reviews.text: It appears to work okay if it doesn't interact with sweat. Used while mountain biking for a few days in a row, and my face started breaking out in a rash later in the afternoon. It also felt like my face was burning and itching when I would start to heat up and sweat just a little. And I am not much of a sweater. Believe it is the octinoxate ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely keep ordering this product as it works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is very lightweight, does not have a "sunscreen" scent and actually controls my oils without drying my skin out. It gives me a healthy glow and doesn't break me out either. I will definitely keep ordering this product as it works great for me! I have oily acne prone skin and am in my mid 20's. It's never too early to worry about sun protection - I feel that this product will work for anyone of all ages with my skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love EltaMD UV Physical and decided to give UV Shield a try. I am in love!! This is my new holy grail. I have oily skin and this is beautiful because it's not shiny or greasy. It might be too drying for dry skin. I've used tinted sunscreen over this as well as makeup powder and it looks amazing. Yay! A new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen was originally suggested to me by my dermatologist. I have acne-prone, combination skin. My skin is very fair and I was previously relying on makeup with sunscreen in it. My dermatologist explained I needed a physical zinc barrier between my skin and the sun, every day. I wear this sunscreen every single day, 365 days a year. I don't feel like it sits on top of my skin, it blends in well under makeup, and doesn't cause breakouts. I have my mom wearing this every day and tell all my friends to try it when they are at my house. Get some for yourself, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Honican

customer_reviews.title: Not a NET 3 OUNCES of contents
customer_reviews.text: We noticed the bottle was half empty and has never been opened. We weighed the tube on the scale and total weight was 3 ounces. We had an empty tube and it weighed 1 ounce by itself. So really we purchased a NET of 2 ounces of sunscreen, which is quite expensive as it is.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Montague

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen for my acne-prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty bad scarring from cystic acne in my teens, and have been required since then by my derm to wear sunscreen on my face literally every day of all my days. I've used several throughout the years, including the non-oily neutrogena brand, and for the most part all work just fine, but the EltaMD brand is truly a superior experience. So easy to apply to your face, and it's so smooth you really don't notice or feel it on you, which is wonderful, especially when you need to wear it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vera

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen I have found!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for those with naturally oily skin and acne prone skin. It’s a light layer and doesn’t leave you feeling gross and greasy. I have very pale and sun sensitive skin, so this is my new go-to. The fact that it’s coral reef safe is just another bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L Billig

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by my dermatologist
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. It's hard to distinguish between all the different sunscreens etc., so I appreciated my doctor's choice of this. It made me feel more secure in choosing it. I apply it daily under concealer and makeup and it has been a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Best sun protection we have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by our dermatologist, great protection for all of us. Bought a series of Elta sun products. My son was the one of the few of his 350 marching band mates not to get sunburned on a recent trip to Australia and New Zealand and is now using it working outdoors at his summer job, fixing roads. This stuff works and works.
customer_reviews.author: katherine plueger

customer_reviews.title: Got sunburned using this product
customer_reviews.text: I would avoid this product for outdoor sun exposure. I got terribly sunburned on my face despite applying and reapplying it at least twice a day while traveling. I bought it for a trip to south america because I thought it wouldn’t clog pores, which was the case because it did feel light. However, I got really badly sunburned when I’ve never gotten sunburned on my face prior to using this product (we were hiking outdoors every day for 5 days). My friends were using neutrogena and no one else got sunburned. I will be going back to neutrogena.
customer_reviews.author: JXY

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I break out at the sight of a sunscreen tube. Even neutrogena breaks me out. Elta MD doesn't bother my skin one bit. And they make a waterproof one that doesn't wash into my eyes or wash away even after over two hours of surfing in warm Hawaii water.
customer_reviews.author: lsawyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suncreeen
customer_reviews.text: After a trip to the dermatologist and having quite a bit of pre cancerous spots burned off, I heard about this sunscreen. I am out doors every day, so I use this on my face daily. Just had a one year follow up appointment, no new spots! My Dr was pleased! This sunscreen is light and non greasy. It applies very easily
customer_reviews.author: Susanna M. Raisor

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLET Physical and Chemical sunscreen for FULL coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great non greasy coverage that absorbs evenly. I start EACH day off with this product, even though I have an office job. After layering this on, there's a bit of a white sheen to the sunscreen, but absorbed after about 10 minutes, or I continue to layer on makeup and it's not noticeable. When dealing with more aggressive sun exposure, with proper reapplication, this has helped avoid sunburns and keep sunspots and reappearing melasma at bay!
customer_reviews.author: UB

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing,  it stinks
customer_reviews.text: I really was expecting a lot from this product, I'm not sure now if it is the real deal. It has a really ugly scent every time I wear it. At first I thought maybe it was a reaction between my moisturizer and the sunblock so I used it with no moisturizer but still it has a real bad smell. I'm so disappointed, is it real or a knockoff?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I used my previous tube up. When you use this sunscreen over moisturizer, it doesn't leave a white film. This is why I bought it. It really works well, if you are worried about brown spots and sunburn. I drive alot so I am very cautious about driver sun spots on my left side of my face. It costs more than drug store brands but you get what you pay for. It is not greasy at all and it is best to put it over your moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Always shopping!

customer_reviews.title: been using for YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily go-to sunscreen. I apply after my serum & moisturizer, before my makeup. It's not drying but not overly greasy. It goes on white but it dries. Non scented, never had any breakouts from it. It came recommended by my dermatologist !
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A.

customer_reviews.title: so good! I've had this sunscreen for a few weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I've had this sunscreen for a few weeks and since I'm outdoors a lot in the summer and suffer from hyperpigmentation, I need something strong with zinc in it. Also, it is so light and sheer, and feels great under makeup. I am also acne prone, and have been delighted that this sunscreen has not contributed to breakouts. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I still wear a wide-brimmed SPF hat in conjunction with this sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a lot of research of what sun protection to use specifically on my face. After purchasing I saw a medical aesthetician and showed her everything I was using and she mentioned this is the best and she uses it daily. I don’t notice any sheen or shine to my face after using, which I seem to always notice on other products, even those that say no shine. It does leave your face somewhat white depending on how much you use, due to the Zinc, but that’s protection! I never burn when I use on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Forbes

customer_reviews.title: It's can be very mattifying
customer_reviews.text: It's goes on slightly white but immediately goes 95% clear - pretty much undetectable. Skin actually looks a little more even. The texture is very creamy and spreads easily. It's mattifying and can make any dry patches of skin more noticeable. If I could, I'd exchange it for one of their more moisturizing sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: Long

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product has had some bad press lately as not providing the SPF protection that it claims. The price has also increased tremendously since I purchased it a little more than a year ago. I thought I was getting more sun exposure than normal when I was wearing it...seemed to be very light/watery and ineffective. I would not purchase again from this site.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a facial sunscreen that does not make my face look dry and chalky and I have finally found it. It also acts as a primer under makeup and does not "pill" as some primers often did. Haven't used long enough to see if it will prevent further brown marks, but am hopeful it will do the job. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Children approved!
customer_reviews.text: My children are awful about putting sun screen on. I dread it. This is the one sunscreen that they don't mind wearing and actually ASK me to put on them. I put it on them before school. There is no greasy or shiny feel and there is no odor. I tried it myself and it can easily be worn with makeup. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Uncertain about quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact it's a mineral sunscreen, but I was disappointed to read Consumer Reports gave the lowest score of all sunscreens to one of Elta's sunscreens, although there was no description why it was so badly rated.
customer_reviews.author: Book fan

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily skin, but bottle feels half empty
customer_reviews.text: I like how the white residue disappears and how it doesn’t leave my skin oily. But the bottle feels already half empty and I feel like I didn’t get my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Angeleah

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I will use nothing else but EltaMD. Goes on smooth, non greasy, and absorbs so well without that white sheen to it. It is my go to everyday facial sunscreen. Doesn't burn my eyes like some others
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Protect you and your loved ones from sun damage that could very well lead to skin cancer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Our dermatologist highly recommended it for my husband who has had many melanomas surgically removed due to sun damage resulting from decades of being in the sun with no protection. Wish we had known the dangers of accumulative damage before now. Protect your skin. This is quality product. It does contain zinc oxide by the way, which is a must.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I forgot to put sunscreen on my hands; now they re-reblister at the slightest hint of sun. I’ve started to regularly apply this to my hands and it prevents the blisters from coming back! Great to apply before a gel manicure as well. Sinks in great, doesn’t feel greasy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: PopozaoPopozao

customer_reviews.title: I was not pleased with the consistency either
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the reviews. I am now honestly wondering if they are fake reviews. This product broke me out and, not only that, it made my normally oily skin extremely dry. I was not pleased with the consistency either. I feel like I have wasted my money because I have almost a full bottle which I can no longer use.
customer_reviews.author: hellokitty

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for a couple of weeks now. Too early to say much about it but I felt a bit of change on my skin. Definitely has helped with how my skin feels, I live in a sunny place so sunscreen is a must. Nothing bad about so far. Definitely will be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Keren Discua

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: As a very popular product nowadays I can not resist to get one! BUT!! When I apply it on my face, it has a very weird feeling between cooling and burning that I cannot really tell. Anyway, it’s very uncomfortable and I’m the opposite of sensitive skin!! Couldn’t imagine how the sensitive skin people feel about it. So I have to use them on my body, which is ok. Well, at least didn’t waste it!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Best sun protection
customer_reviews.text: If you are exposed to sun, this is your product. I'm an avid golfer so I use this product religiously. Its light feel but not very moisturizing. It almost feels like you are wearing an umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am outside much of the time. Living in Texas , my life style is hard on my skin. I have had one basal cell carcinoma on my cheek. I do not want to do that again. This is a great sunscreen product. My face and neck are as light has my skin that doesn't ever see sunlight!
customer_reviews.author: Lana Horne

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! It rubs in completely clear without leaving a white residue. It doesn't cause breakouts, rashes or drying skin. Overall I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Big White Cast
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended of this brand of sunscreen by my friend. However, it seems this product doesn't suit my skin type, leaves my skin feeling super dry. The product sits on top of my skin, and leaves a big white cast, not the most flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong item. Don’t order from amazon.
customer_reviews.text: You’re better off going to Ulta and picking it out yourself because while I did receive an Elta sunscreen, it was not the correct one. This should’ve been SPF 45 for oily skin and I instead received SPF 30 for dry skin and the ingredients are completely different.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a month and it’s okay, but I have super oily skin! I am not against the product, and I believe it may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie40

customer_reviews.title: Dermatologist Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product because my dermatologists suggested that I try it because I am a woman of color. I can't really give my true opinion at this time because I bought two different ones by this company. I will write a review on the UV sport screen because that's what I'm using at this time.
customer_reviews.author: LEENA

customer_reviews.title: I think this is perfect for my oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I think this is perfect for my oily skin! I have no increased oil production by the end of the days. Feels incredibly lightweight on my skin. I feel like my skin can breathe under the relatively high SPF. This is a BARGAIN for 3 oz! I've paid over $40 for an ounce for SPF in the past and really don't want to again. I have this and the similar tinted version that is a total physical SPF. Love them both and will continue to use! No scent, no white gloppy mess (I have pale skin), no excessively dry skin from the zinc, no breakouts. Overall happy happy!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Heintz

customer_reviews.title: Why does it have an AHA if its for photosensitive skin?
customer_reviews.text: I have heard great things about the EltaMD line and was disappointed to learn that this sunscreen had citric acid (AHA). It was advertised as sensitive enough to be used in conjunction with photosensitizing medications which implies medication like Tretinoin and Benzol Peroxide. An AHA in a sunscreen described as being safe for photosensitive skin is counter productive and can lead to allergic contact dermatitis (which I did get).
customer_reviews.author: Esther Pena

customer_reviews.title: light and effective
customer_reviews.text: recommended by a friend who bought her first tube from a dermatologist. Definitely not greasy, flows on lightly and does not seem to interfere with or interact with my moisturizer (I do not use foundation). Spain & Morocco have very strong sun and I did not get any sunburn or extra color during the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Empty Box ...No Product Inside

customer_reviews.author: Mary Bernheim

customer_reviews.title: The best for me
customer_reviews.text: Skin care clinic recommendation. Fills my need in every way. This product does not have that filmy residue feel. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Love!

Oh n no white cast leftovers! It’s a sheer whitewhich is good for seeing where you put it but it fisapoears quickly. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Works for brown skin too.

customer_reviews.author: K. Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Effective protection from sun for lupus rash
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this for sun protection due to hyper sensitivity related to lupus. The product worked very well for me.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sunscreen

customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid burning eyes from sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I like the ability to apply to forehead and eyebrows and not worry about sweat causing sunscreen to irritate the eyes. Other, non-facial sunscreens are horrible in this regard.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.author: Glendaa

customer_reviews.title: I’m sold on this!

customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: it's really good product.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I have very sensitive skin, and most of the sunscreen brands gave me acne or skin troubles .This does not cause acne! Cons: This is not waterproof. I get sweat around my nose and mouth. I got darker skin on that area, unfortunately. Otherwise, it's really good product.

customer_reviews.title: Fantatic product
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful sunscreen for your face,. What a treat to use everyday.

product_meta.title: EltaMD UV Shield Full-Body Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum
product_meta.description:
Size:3 Ounce

Treat your skin to this sheer, oil-free full-body sunscreen. Cosmetically elegant mineral- based EltaMD UV Shield is recommended by dermatologists for oily to normal skin. It is ideal worn under makeup or alone. Fragrance-free, paraben-free, sensitivity-free and noncomedogenic.

Ingredient Insights

Zinc oxide: Natural mineral compound that works as a sunscreen agent by reflecting and scattering UVA and UVB rays

Tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E): Antioxidant that reduces free radicals to help diminish the visible signs of aging

Inactive Ingredients: Purified Water, Isopropyl Palmitate, Octyl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 60, Oleth-3 Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyisobutene, Polyether-1, Butylene Glycol, PEG-7 Trimethylolpropane Coconut Ether, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citric Acid, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane.



BRAND STORY
EltaMD Skin Care is committed to helping you have great skin for life. Our company has developed sunscreen, skin care products and wound healing products trusted by physicians for more than 25 years.
